text: @SpeakerPelosi @Morning_Joe And what are you prepared for? Trump called out the coronavirus in his SOTU address. Video shows you practicing tearing up his speech. So you didn’t pay attention. Just focused on your narcissistic self. https://t.co/Y8NK2ihL2X
